channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dems seek to limit who can be immigration judges. And, the GOP wins House election
item.description: Democrats seek to limit who can serve as immigration judges amid layoffs from the administration. And, Republican Matt Van Epps narrowly wins a specia...

item.title: One year on from martial law crisis, South Korea celebrates its democracy's resilience
item.description: One year on from failed presidential power grab, South Korea celebrates its resilient democracy, and tries to heal deep political divisions.

item.title: Doctors warn delaying hepatitis B shot for newborns could revive a deadly threat
item.description: As RFK Jr.'s new vaccine panel ponders changing the hepatitis B vaccination schedule, some doctors recall past patients, including children, who died ...

item.title: Belgium rejects EU plan to use frozen Russian assets for Ukraine
item.description: Belgium on Wednesday rejected a plan to use frozen Russian assets to help prop up Ukraine's economy and war effort over the next two years, saying tha...

item.title: A Palestinian convicted in bombing plot is now an award-winning novelist, and free
item.description: Bassem Khandaqji entered prison 21 years ago for plotting a deadly bombing in Israel. He left prison as an award-winning novelist.

item.title: Retired in His Mid-40s Using the Perfect “Small” Rental Property Formula

item.title: How to Find High-Cash-Flow Vacation Rentals Using “Secret” Airbnb Data

item.title: Autolane is building ‘air traffic control’ for autonomous vehicles
item.description: And the Palo Alto-based startup has raised $7.4 million to do that.

item.title: Google Photos’ 2025 Recap turns to Gemini to find your highlights
item.description: The Google Photos Recap will use Gemini's AI to find your memorable moments throughout the year, and adds new metrics, like a 'selfie' count.

item.title: Spotify Wrapped 2025 adds its first multiplayer feature with ‘Wrapped Party’

item.title: Waymo starts autonomous testing in Philadelphia
item.description: Baltimore, Philadelphia, Pittsburgh, and St. Louis join a long list of cities where the company is gearing up to offer robotaxi rides.

item.title: Amazon Fire TV’s new AI feature lets you jump to scenes by describing them to Alexa+
item.description: Amazon says you can describe the scene to Alexa by mentioning details like the actor or character's name, or a memorable quote.

item.title: Trump targets Minnesota’s Somali community with harsh words and policies
Trump-backed Republican Matt Van Epps wins US House special election in Tennessee
Federal authorities plan operation in Minnesota focusing on Somali immigrants, AP source says
item.description: Federal authorities are preparing an immigration enforcement operation in Minnesota, focusing on Somali immigrants living unlawfully in the U.S.

item.title: The Average Homebuyer is Now Older Than Ever—And It Has an Impact on Rent Prices
item.description: The median age of homebuyers in the U.S. is a venerable 59 years old, according to the National Association of Realtors (NAR). That could be good news...

item.title: How Local Laws Have Made Life Harder For Mom-and-Pop Investors—And What to Do About It
